item.title: Known Faces Degraded request times
item.content:encoded:
[High] - Investigating Issue

Summary: We are currently investigating a major issue that has caused platform downtime.

Mar 11, 18:37 UTC
Investigating - We are currently investigating this issue.

item.title: Unable to create checks in EU
item.content:encoded:
[Medium] - Ongoing investigation for system issue

Summary: Our team is currently investigating an issue with the system. We have identified the issue and are working on implementing a fix. We apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.

Mar 4, 11:05 UTC
Identified - The issue has been identified and a fix is being implemented.

Mar 4, 11:04 UTC
Update - We are continuing to investigate this issue.

Mar 4, 10:49 UTC
Investigating - We are currently investigating this issue.

item.title: Increased latency on check processing
item.content:encoded:
[High] - Processing Latency Fix Implemented

Processing latency issue has been fixed by implementing a solution. Monitoring is ongoing until all the backlog is processed. [Medium] - Ongoing Investigation

The company is currently investigating an issue and working on finding a resolution.

Mar 3, 13:57 UTC
Monitoring - We implemented a fix and processing latency is back to normal.
We are monitoring closely until all the backlog is processed.

Mar 3, 13:36 UTC
Investigating - We are currently investigating this issue.

item.title: Identity report with increased TaT for USA jurisdiction
item.content:encoded:
[Medium] - Investigating Summary: The company is currently investigating an issue. [High] - Monitoring Summary: The root cause has been found and the company is monitoring the situation as things return to normal. [Low] - Resolved Summary: The incident has been resolved.

Mar 1, 10:42 UTC
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Mar 1, 10:24 UTC
Monitoring - Found the root cause. TaT are back to normal.

Mar 1, 10:16 UTC
Investigating - We are currently investigating the issue.

item.title: Delays in check processing
item.content:encoded:
[Low] - Delayed Check Issue

Summary: The issue has been resolved with an applied fix, and the remaining delayed checks are expected to be completed in the next 45 minutes. Apologies for any inconvenience.

Feb 12, 05:02 UTC
Resolved - This issue has been resolved and we've applied a fix. We expect to complete the remaining delayed checks in the next 45 minutes or so. We apologize for any inconvenience this has caused.

Feb 12, 04:43 UTC
Monitoring - We are monitoring.

Feb 12, 04:39 UTC
Investigating - We are currently investigating this issue.

item.title: Smart Capture Link service degradation
item.content:encoded:
Feb 9, 17:30 UTC
Resolved - A service release caused Smart Capture Link media upload to fail. This issue is now resolved.

item.title: Known Faces service degradation
item.content:encoded:
Jan 29, 17:31 UTC
Resolved - This issue is now resolved.

Jan 29, 16:26 UTC
Monitoring - We have implemented a fix for this issue.

We are monitoring closely to make sure the issue has been resolved and everything is working as expected.

Jan 29, 15:27 UTC
Identified - We are experiencing service degradation impacting the Known Faces product. The root cause has since been identified and a fix is being applied.

item.title: Increased latency on check processing
item.content:encoded:
Jan 2, 19:26 UTC
Resolved - This incident is resolved. Most of the reports that were queued as a result of this issue have been cleared and turnaround times are returning to normal. Any remaining queued reports are expected to complete within the next five hours. We apologize for the degraded service.

Jan 2, 16:26 UTC
Update - We are continuing to monitor for any further issues.

Jan 2, 16:23 UTC
Monitoring - We have implemented a fix for this issue in the EU region.

We are monitoring closely to make sure issue has been resolved and everything is working as expected. Please bear with us while we get back on our feet and we appreciate your patience during this incident.

Jan 2, 16:05 UTC
Identified - The issue has been identified and a fix is being implemented.

Jan 2, 15:00 UTC
Investigating - We are currently investigating this issue.

item.title: Increased latency on check processing
item.content:encoded:
Dec 21, 13:04 UTC
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Dec 21, 10:40 UTC
Monitoring - We implemented a fix and processing latency is back to normal.
We are monitoring closely until all the backlog is processed.

Dec 21, 10:21 UTC
Identified - We have identified the source of the disruption and are working on a solution

Dec 21, 09:57 UTC
Investigating - We've currently experiencing issues that are negatively impacting latency on check processing.

item.title: Increased latency on check creation
item.content:encoded:
Dec 19, 16:51 UTC
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Dec 19, 14:05 UTC
Monitoring - We have implemented a fix for this issue.

We are monitoring closely to make sure issue has been resolved and everything is working as expected. Please bear with us while we get back on our feet and we appreciate your patience during this incident.

Dec 19, 13:46 UTC
Investigating - We've currently experiencing issues that are negatively impacting latency on check creation.

Our next update will be in 15 minutes. Thank you for your patience.

item.title: EU Infrastructure Maintenance
item.content:encoded:
Dec 17, 06:06 UTC
Completed - The scheduled maintenance has been completed.

Dec 17, 04:59 UTC
Verifying - The maintenance operation is done and traffic has been reopened.
We are monitoring our systems.

Dec 17, 03:32 UTC
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Nov 14, 15:08 UTC
Scheduled - We will be performing a series of system upgrades, during which Onfido services in the EU instance will be unavailable.

We have selected this timeframe to limit the impact to our customers, since check volume is typically low. As no checks in the EU instance can be processed during this maintenance window, please plan accordingly and notify your end users, if applicable.

item.title: New checks missing in Dashboard
item.content:encoded:
Dec 17, 06:05 UTC
Resolved - We have cleared the backlog, all checks will show in the Onfido Dashboard

Dec 17, 05:39 UTC
Identified - We have identified the issue and we are processing the backlog of checks.

Dec 17, 05:07 UTC
Investigating - Checks/reports issued in the past 2 hours are missing from the Onfido Dashboard, we are working on restoring the data.

item.title: Limited delays in check processing
item.content:encoded:
Dec 6, 19:05 UTC
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Dec 6, 17:02 UTC
Update - The issue is mitigated and there is no impact. We will continue monitoring.

Dec 6, 16:00 UTC
Update - We are continuing to investigate this issue.

Dec 6, 15:15 UTC
Update - The issue is limited to EU.
We are still experiencing limited degraded performance in EU.

Dec 6, 15:05 UTC
Update - We are continuing to investigate this issue.

Dec 6, 14:50 UTC
Investigating - We've currently experiencing issues that are negatively impacting latency on check completion.

Our next update will be in 15 minutes. Thank you for your patience.

item.title: US Infrastructure Maintenance
item.content:encoded:
Nov 29, 10:01 UTC
Completed - The scheduled maintenance has been completed.

Nov 29, 09:55 UTC
Verifying - The maintenance operations are done. We are now monitoring the system.

Nov 29, 08:30 UTC
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Nov 14, 15:07 UTC
Scheduled - We will be performing a series of system upgrades, during which Onfido services in the US instance will be unavailable.

We have selected this timeframe to limit the impact to our customers, since check volume is typically low. As no checks in the US instance can be processed during this maintenance window, please plan accordingly and notify your end users, if applicable.

item.title: Watchlist Full partial outage
item.content:encoded:
Nov 25, 16:29 UTC
Resolved - All affected Watchlist Full and Watchlist KYC reports have been completed. The newly created reports are completing normally.

Nov 25, 16:10 UTC
Monitoring - We're now able to contact our partner again. We're monitoring the issue to make sure all systems are back to normal operation and reports are completed.

Nov 25, 16:08 UTC
Update - We are continuing to investigate this issue.

Nov 25, 16:07 UTC
Investigating - We're experiencing issues contacting one of Onfido's data partner for Watchlist Full, starting from the 25 November 2023, 15:33 UTC.

As a result, Watchlist Full reports will not complete and remain in the 'pending' status. Those reports will be completed as soon as we're able to contact our partner again.

item.title: CA Infrastructure Maintenance
item.content:encoded:
Nov 20, 09:35 UTC
Completed - The scheduled maintenance has been completed.

Nov 20, 09:25 UTC
Verifying - All maintenance operations have completed. We have reopened the API and are monitoring the system closely.

Nov 20, 08:32 UTC
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Nov 20, 08:31 UTC
Update - We will be undergoing scheduled maintenance during this time.

Nov 14, 15:06 UTC
Scheduled - We will be performing a series of system upgrades, during which Onfido services in the CA instance will be unavailable.

We have selected this timeframe to limit the impact to our customers, since check volume is typically low. As no checks in the CA instance can be processed during this maintenance window, please plan accordingly and notify your end users, if applicable.

item.title: Degraded upload video experience
item.content:encoded:
Nov 8, 18:26 UTC
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Nov 8, 17:23 UTC
Monitoring - We've taken measures to try and stabilise the system. Our metrics indicate problem has now been mitigated. We are continuing to investigate the root cause of this incident.

Nov 8, 17:01 UTC
Investigating - We are currently investigating this issue.

item.title: Error creating checks
item.content:encoded:
Nov 8, 13:00 UTC
Resolved - A new version of one of our internal services released at 13:00 resulted in a spike in the number of errors in the create check operation.

The incident was resolved at 13:22.

item.title: Increased latency on document check processing
item.content:encoded:
Nov 2, 18:50 UTC
Resolved - This issue is now resolved:

Increased latency on document check processing

We take a lot of pride in running a robust, reliable service and we're working hard to make sure this does not happen again. A detailed postmortem will follow once we've concluded our investigation.

Nov 2, 18:31 UTC
Monitoring - We have implemented a fix for this issue.

We are monitoring closely to make sure issue has been resolved and everything is working as expected. Please bear with us while we get back on our feet and we appreciate your patience during this incident.

Nov 2, 18:21 UTC
Investigating - We're currently experiencing issues that are negatively impacting latency on document check processing.

Our next update will be in 15 minutes. Thank you for your patience.

item.title: Dashboard in EU is partially unavailable
item.content:encoded:
Oct 26, 16:42 UTC
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

The capacity of part of our search infrastructure was insufficient to service request volumes, and has been scaled up accordingly.

Oct 26, 14:23 UTC
Monitoring - There was an increase of load in our database backends. It is now back to normal. We are monitoring and searching for the source of the load increase

Oct 26, 13:00 UTC
Investigating - The Dashboard in EU is unavailable and will report errors when running searches.
We are investigating

item.title: Anomalous number of 5xx errors on the Studio API
item.content:encoded:
Oct 26, 04:12 UTC
Resolved - On 2023-10-26, a failure in the rate limiting middleware for the Studio API denied access to rate-limited endpoints for a period of 8 minutes, during 04:12am and 04:20am.

item.title: Webhooks delivery delayed
item.content:encoded:
Oct 24, 09:44 UTC
Resolved - The system is completely operational now.

Oct 24, 09:34 UTC
Monitoring - The issue was found and fixed. Keep monitoring the state of the system.

Oct 24, 08:44 UTC
Investigating - We observe that the delivery of the webhook is late.

item.title: UK ID card clear rate dropped
item.content:encoded:
Oct 18, 08:22 UTC
Resolved - The issue was resolved

Oct 18, 08:03 UTC
Identified - Issue is identified, waiting 3rd party partner to resolve it on their side.

Oct 18, 07:22 UTC
Update - The root cause of the failure is the 3rd party provider degradation. We contacted the support to raise the issue.

Oct 18, 07:21 UTC
Investigating - We observe degradation in UK address verification which leads to UK ID cards clear rate drop.

item.title: ID Records product is experiencing about 10% decrease in clear rates for applicants in the UK
item.content:encoded:
Oct 5, 08:49 UTC
Resolved - This incident has been resolved. We apologize for any inconvenience this has caused.

Oct 5, 07:52 UTC
Monitoring - The issue has been resolved. We'll keep on monitoring to ensure that incident is solved.

Oct 5, 06:54 UTC
Investigating - ID Record is experiencing about 10% decrease in clear rates for KYC reports in the UK. We are currently investigating and we'll be back with an update shortly.

item.title: The ID Record product is experiencing errors in the UK
item.content:encoded:
Oct 1, 01:42 UTC
Resolved - The incident has been resolved since 00:50 UTC.

Oct 1, 00:53 UTC
Update - We are continuing to investigate the issue.

Oct 1, 00:05 UTC
Investigating - We are experiencing an issue with an underlying provider affecting UK checks clear rate. We apologize for any inconvenience and we'll be back with an update shortly.

item.title: Applicant form is down
item.content:encoded:
Sep 15, 10:27 UTC
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Sep 15, 10:11 UTC
Monitoring - A fix has been implemented and we will keep monitoring.

Sep 15, 09:39 UTC
Update - We are continuing to investigate this issue.

Sep 15, 09:39 UTC
Investigating - We are currently investigating an issue with applicantform failing to load in the EU region.

item.title: Identity Enhanced is experiencing a major decrease in clear rates for applicants all other the world except UK
item.content:encoded:
Sep 11, 15:21 UTC
Resolved - The issue has been resolved by our external provider and Identity Record service is now back to normal.

Sep 11, 15:13 UTC
Monitoring - The degradation has stopped since 14:49 UTC. We will monitor if the issue is fully resolved.

Sep 11, 15:07 UTC
Identified - The underlying provider has found the issue and is working on a fix.

Sep 11, 14:16 UTC
Update - We are still investigating issues with one of the providers for identity enhanced.

Sep 11, 13:56 UTC
Investigating - We are currently investigating the issue in one of the providers

Sep 11, 13:55 UTC
Identified - The issue has been identified and a fix is being implemented.

item.title: Delays in document check processing in the EU region
item.content:encoded:
Aug 29, 14:29 UTC
Resolved - This issue has been resolved & the backlog has been processed. We apologize for any inconvenience this has caused.

Aug 29, 07:37 UTC
Monitoring - The fix for the Document Checks delays has worked and overall delays are decreasing. The expected backlog for those tasks using manual processing is estimated to be 18 hours. We will update you once delays have completely subsided.

Aug 29, 07:30 UTC
Identified - Our team has identified the source of the issue with the Document Checks delays and is working to address the problem.

Aug 29, 07:16 UTC
Update - We are continuing to investigate this issue.

Aug 29, 07:12 UTC
Investigating - We're investigating reports of delays in completing Document Checks. We are working hard to make sure that completion times return to normal.

item.title: Watchlist product is experiencing errors
item.content:encoded:
Aug 8, 08:57 UTC
Resolved - Everything is working and getting no errors from our partner

Aug 8, 08:34 UTC
Update - Not getting errors from requests to our partner anymore.
Still waiting on confirmation from their side that everything is working as expected.

Aug 8, 08:25 UTC
Identified - Our partner is having an issue on their side and working on a fix.
